Issue 134 – November 2017
Cover Art
Homecoming 2
Jonas De Ro is a digital artist involved in freelance and in-house concept art, design and illustration for film and games. He currently lives and works in Tokyo, Japan.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
